Michael Page (www.michaelpage.co.in) is a global leader in providing specialized recruitment 

consulting services across industries. Listed on the London Stock Exchange, Michael Page has 40 

years of professional experience in providing tailored recruitment solutions, which has enabled to become the preferred recruitment partner for multiple multinational and Indian companies.

I believe these qualities are truly rare in the world of professional recruitment and is extremely beneficial in the long-run for the companies she will be working for. I am extremely thankful to her and wish her all the best in all her endeavors. ”

publications.title: Search Engine Optimization with Clipboard History
publications.subtitle: IBM
publications.description: Most of the search engines currently perform checks on -The count of the given keywords repeated on a website-The quality of the website -Whether the keywords appear in the title, in the URL, or directly in the JSON.However, to provide quality search responses, a search engine must understand what users are searching for and the responses users wish to consume.For example, a user who searches for a homonym may not end up with the desired response.Proposed is a system and method to efficiently provide contextual search responses by tracking the user's clipboard history.

projects.title: Models On Social Network Analysis
projects.description: Developed a model with the team using Networkx in Python and Gephi for rendering the graph formed by considering transitive relation among peoples using same interest and friendship strength between them to evolve the model. Finally, the degree distribution of the people in the model shows result that is comparable to the standard Scale Free Network

projects.title: Understanding and Implementing various Wireless Downlink Scheduling Strategies available in LTE-Sim
projects.description: I have studied the LTE architecture and there by understanding and implementing various Wireless Downlink Scheduler strategies which are available in LTE-Sim as well as using Unix Shell Scripting plotted their graphs for different number of user present in a cell for a Single Cell With Interference scenario. I have also analysed advantages of the Enhanced Proportionality Fair with respect to PF Scheduling strategy. All in terms of cell/user throughput, fairness and Packet Loss Rate for QoSaware/unaware and Channel-aware/unaware and semi-persistent for VOIP support.

advertisements to users and thereby making the app experience more relevant for the users.

# Worked on the Airtel Postpaid Family Journey, which resulted in increase in revenue by almost 40% and increased the customer stickiness.

detailed_profile.about: Hey there! 👋 I'm Yadhu Krishna M, on a mission to fortify the online world. With 5+ years in Security, I'm all about locking down vulnerabilities. 🚀 Currently, working as a Product Security Engineer at CRED, I'm strengthening platform security. 💻 Beyond work, I'm an active voice in cybersecurity discussions. Connect to discuss web security, cybersecurity, or just say hi! Let's make the digital space safer. 🔐

positions.subtitle: CRED
positions.description: - Spearheading the adoption of a shift-left security approach, embedding robust measures such as SBOM generation & versioning, SCA, SAST, secret scanning, logging & monitoring, and SCM security into the SDLC. - Designed an open-source framework "SupplyShield" capable of supporting security scans for 1,000+ daily deployments, enabling automated and consistent security assessments. - Developed an in-house Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) dashboard to track overall and pod-wise security posture.
positions.title: Senior Security Engineer
positions.description_html:
- Spearheading the adoption of a shift-left security approach, embedding robust measures such as SBOM generation & versioning, SCA, SAST, secret scanning, logging & monitoring, and SCM security into the SDLC.

- Designed an open-source framework "SupplyShield" capable of supporting security scans for 1,000+ daily deployments, enabling automated and consistent security assessments.

- Developed an in-house Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) dashboard to track overall and pod-wise security posture.

positions.subtitle: CRED
positions.description: - Developed guidelines and automated processes for the Responsible Disclosure Program, ensuring timely and efficient handling of vulnerabilities with SLA-driven responses. This reduced response times by 55%. - Developed AI powered security tools "ShieldX" and "RapidRDP" to enhance security team and developer productivity. - Conducted annual Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions and hands-on security training sessions for 100+ engineers and elevated security knowledge across teams. - Managed end-to-end security for the GTMs of 3+ products, ensuring they met security standards from inception to deployment.

publications.description: Most of the search engines currently perform checks on -The count of the given keywords repeated on a website-The quality of the website -Whether the keywords appear in the title, in the URL, or directly in the JSON.However, to provide quality search responses, a search engine must understand what users are searching for and the responses users wish to consume.For example, a user who searches for a homonym may not end up with the desired response.Proposed is a system and method to efficiently provide contextual search responses by tracking the user's clipboard history.

advertisements to users and thereby making the app experience more relevant for the users.

# Worked on the Airtel Postpaid Family Journey, which resulted in increase in revenue by almost 40% and increased the customer stickiness.

detailed_profile.about: Hey there! 👋 I'm Yadhu Krishna M, on a mission to fortify the online world. With 5+ years in Security, I'm all about locking down vulnerabilities. 🚀 Currently, working as a Product Security Engineer at CRED, I'm strengthening platform security. 💻 Beyond work, I'm an active voice in cybersecurity discussions. Connect to discuss web security, cybersecurity, or just say hi! Let's make the digital space safer. 🔐

positions.subtitle: CRED
positions.description: - Spearheading the adoption of a shift-left security approach, embedding robust measures such as SBOM generation & versioning, SCA, SAST, secret scanning, logging & monitoring, and SCM security into the SDLC. - Designed an open-source framework "SupplyShield" capable of supporting security scans for 1,000+ daily deployments, enabling automated and consistent security assessments. - Developed an in-house Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) dashboard to track overall and pod-wise security posture.
positions.title: Senior Security Engineer
positions.description_html:
- Spearheading the adoption of a shift-left security approach, embedding robust measures such as SBOM generation & versioning, SCA, SAST, secret scanning, logging & monitoring, and SCM security into the SDLC.

- Designed an open-source framework "SupplyShield" capable of supporting security scans for 1,000+ daily deployments, enabling automated and consistent security assessments.

- Developed an in-house Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) dashboard to track overall and pod-wise security posture.

positions.subtitle: CRED
positions.description: - Developed guidelines and automated processes for the Responsible Disclosure Program, ensuring timely and efficient handling of vulnerabilities with SLA-driven responses. This reduced response times by 55%. - Developed AI powered security tools "ShieldX" and "RapidRDP" to enhance security team and developer productivity. - Conducted annual Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions and hands-on security training sessions for 100+ engineers and elevated security knowledge across teams. - Managed end-to-end security for the GTMs of 3+ products, ensuring they met security standards from inception to deployment.

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
# Awarded the spirit of collaboration award twice for work in app backend journeys and reducing failures in microservices, thereby improving availability and increasing customer stickiness.

#Worked on the Offer Card Engine project, a portal for in-house use to serve campaigns /
advertisements to users and thereby making the app experience more relevant for the users.

page metadata, and render the page at runtime using this, thus allowing great room for modifications to the page on the go.

# Worked on the Airtel Postpaid Family Journey, which resulted in increase in revenue by almost 40% and increased the customer stickiness.

# Integrated Jaeger with one of our microservices, an open-source tracing tool, resulting in better monitoring and easy debugging in case of failure.

# Worked on the Airtel Bundling Unbundling App Backend journey, enabling users to bundle their postpaid, dth and telemedia services, enabling them to treat all their products combined as a single product, thereby increasing customer retention and onboarding by manifolds.

positions.subtitle: CRED
positions.description: - Spearheading the adoption of a shift-left security approach, embedding robust measures such as SBOM generation & versioning, SCA, SAST, secret scanning, logging & monitoring, and SCM security into the SDLC. - Designed an open-source framework "SupplyShield" capable of supporting security scans for 1,000+ daily deployments, enabling automated and consistent security assessments. - Developed an in-house Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) dashboard to track overall and pod-wise security posture.
positions.title: Senior Security Engineer
positions.description_html:
- Spearheading the adoption of a shift-left security approach, embedding robust measures such as SBOM generation & versioning, SCA, SAST, secret scanning, logging & monitoring, and SCM security into the SDLC.

- Designed an open-source framework "SupplyShield" capable of supporting security scans for 1,000+ daily deployments, enabling automated and consistent security assessments.

- Developed an in-house Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) dashboard to track overall and pod-wise security posture.

positions.description: - Developed guidelines and automated processes for the Responsible Disclosure Program, ensuring timely and efficient handling of vulnerabilities with SLA-driven responses. detailed_profile.position: Partner - Commercial and Healthcare at Cred Financial Services
detailed_profile.about: I am an energetic and vibrant Sales and Account Management Professional with a wealth of experience in Commercial and Corporate banking across Australasia with specific areas of expertise incorporating credit risk analysis, business acquisition, and customer retention. I have an innovative solutions driven approach, which is supported by my curious, results-driven nature and exemplary focus on customer service. I value honesty and integrity, building trust and respect with Stakeholders through excellent communication both verbal and written. My exceptional sales focus on both new and existing business is evidenced by a systematic approach that has increased revenue growth. Credentials include Bachelor of Commerce (Accounting & International Business) and a Diploma in Financial Services RG146. My key skills include: Sales Management | Business Development | Credit Risk | Business Acquisition | Customer Retention | Analytics - Research & Trend Analysis | Relationship Management | Customer Service | Process Improvement | Training & Mentoring. I currently hold a Tier 5 Working Holiday visa for UK expiring in February 2019

experience.title: Team Leader
experience.description:
- **Collections & Recoveries Management**  

  - Managed collections for X-BKT to Write-Off BKT across multiple portfolios in Delhi NCR & UP.  

  - Implemented timely and effective recovery strategies to maximize collections.  


- **Team Handling & Performance Management**  

  - Led in-house tele-callers and direct collection executives to drive performance.  

  - Ensured productivity across multiple portfolios through strategic team management.  


- **Allocation & Segmentation Strategy**  

  - Segmented accounts based on high & low risk for better coverage.  

  - Optimized recovery performance through targeted allocation.  


- **Legal Coordination & Execution**  

  - Initiated, monitored, and executed legal matters related to collections.  

  - Ensured compliance with legal frameworks to support recovery efforts.  


- **MIS & Feedback Mechanism**  

  - Collected and analyzed daily feedback from field executives.  

  - Prepared comprehensive MIS reports for smooth follow-up on collections.  


- **Process Compliance & Adherence**  

  - Ensured strict adherence to collection processes with zero deviations.  

  - Maintained operational discipline across portfolios under supervision.  


- **Target Achievement**  

  - Consistently met and exceeded monthly collection and recovery targets.  

  - Implemented strategies to enhance efficiency and maximize revenue.

detailed_profile.about: Passionate FinTech Professional | Managing Cred Flash (BNPL) | Expertise in Collections & Customer Experience With a strong background in financial services, digital lending, and customer experience, I am currently managing Cred Flash - Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL), driving its end-to-end operations and growth. Over the years, I have gained hands-on expertise in collections, recoveries, team leadership, process optimization, and customer satisfaction across various financial portfolios, including consumer durable loans, auto loans, and digital lending products. My core skills include: ✔ Strategic Planning & Process Improvement ✔ Customer Engagement & Retention ✔ Risk Management & Revenue Maximization ✔ Team Leadership & Performance Enhancement ✔ Data Analysis & Reporting Always eager to take on new challenges, streamline operations, and enhance financial products to drive maximum impact. 🚀

experience.title: Team Leader
experience.description:
- **Collections & Recoveries Management**  

  - Managed collections for X-BKT to Write-Off BKT across multiple portfolios in Delhi NCR & UP.  

  - Implemented timely and effective recovery strategies to maximize collections.  


- **Team Handling & Performance Management**  

  - Led in-house tele-callers and direct collection executives to drive performance.  

  - Ensured productivity across multiple portfolios through strategic team management.  


- **Allocation & Segmentation Strategy**  

  - Segmented accounts based on high & low risk for better coverage.  

  - Optimized recovery performance through targeted allocation.  


- **Legal Coordination & Execution**  

  - Initiated, monitored, and executed legal matters related to collections.  

  - Ensured compliance with legal frameworks to support recovery efforts.  


- **MIS & Feedback Mechanism**  

  - Collected and analyzed daily feedback from field executives.  

  - Prepared comprehensive MIS reports for smooth follow-up on collections.  


- **Process Compliance & Adherence**  

  - Ensured strict adherence to collection processes with zero deviations.  

  - Maintained operational discipline across portfolios under supervision.  


- **Target Achievement**  

  - Consistently met and exceeded monthly collection and recovery targets.  

  - Implemented strategies to enhance efficiency and maximize revenue.

projects.title: Models On Social Network Analysis
projects.description: Developed a model with the team using Networkx in Python and Gephi for rendering the graph formed by considering transitive relation among peoples using same interest and friendship strength between them to evolve the model. Finally, the degree distribution of the people in the model shows result that is comparable to the standard Scale Free Network

projects.title: Understanding and Implementing various Wireless Downlink Scheduling Strategies available in LTE-Sim
projects.description: I have studied the LTE architecture and there by understanding and implementing various Wireless Downlink Scheduler strategies which are available in LTE-Sim as well as using Unix Shell Scripting plotted their graphs for different number of user present in a cell for a Single Cell With Interference scenario. I have also analysed advantages of the Enhanced Proportionality Fair with respect to PF Scheduling strategy. All in terms of cell/user throughput, fairness and Packet Loss Rate for QoSaware/unaware and Channel-aware/unaware and semi-persistent for VOIP support.

projects.title: Information Cum Discussion Portal
projects.description: Developed a system with the team, an information portal that would enable all the students to create an account against college name and username(unique) to interact with students of the college/branch in the form of questions and answers solely for educational purposes. Questions shall be filtered and updated accordingly.

projects.title: Tablet Counter Using LDR and LED
projects.description: This project which utilizes the knowledge of Embedded System Course in which I have made a system which counts the number of tablet passed through a pipe and there by showing the counted number on the seven segment display.

projects.title: Switch Press Buzzer
projects.description: Developed a project with team, which utilizes the knowledge of microprocessor to develop a parallel tracking of the switches pressed and thereby extend it to a 7 segment display to enable the viewer to view the switch which has been pressed firstly.

projects.title: E-Commerce Android Application
projects.description: I have made this Project basically which utilizes the DBMS knowledge and Java to make a shopping application where user can order any number of product by adding on his cart or from his wishlist. The details of booked order along with the total product price will be shown to the user in his order history details.

recommendations: Shubham Utwal “A Remarkable Senior Colleague and Mentor! I have admired Rajeev from the moment I joined Gojek, and having had the pleasure of working closely on various initiatives within Gojek, in retrospect, the interactions have left a lasting mark on my career and personal growth. Throughout my time working with Rajeev, I have had the opportunity to collaborate on recruitment drives, attend enlightening distributed systems sessions, engage in thought-provoking discussions about uptime and production issues, and participate in various organization-wide initiatives, including incident management. Rajeev’s contributions and expertise in these areas have been invaluable to my professional development. What sets Rajeev apart is not only his technical knowledge and skills but also his unwavering dedication to mentoring and guiding others. Whenever I sought assistance, Rajeev was always willing to lend a helping hand and share his insights. His guidance has played a significant role in shaping my understanding of character-building, execution, and the importance of embracing new challenges, eg. leading the "hangout with the makers" podcast series. One of the most impressive aspects of working with Rajeev is his ability to teach passively. Observing how he approached tasks and tackled obstacles, I learned the importance of perseverance, resilience, and maintaining a positive mindset, regardless of the outcome. Rajeev’s unwavering commitment to giving his best in every situation has served as an inspiration to me and has motivated me to strive for excellence in my own work. Beyond his technical expertise, Rajeev embodies the qualities of a true leader. He consistently demonstrates a strong work ethic, exceptional communication skills, and a genuine interest in fostering a collaborative and supportive work environment. His inclusive approach and willingness to engage in meaningful discussions have fostered a sense of camaraderie among the team and have created an atmosphere of continuous learning. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Rajeev as an outstanding professional and mentor. His contributions to our organization, coupled with his willingness to support and guide others, make him a highly valuable asset. I am grateful for the knowledge and insights I have gained from Rajeev and I am confident that anyone fortunate enough to work with him will benefit greatly from his expertise, mentorship, and exceptional leadership abilities. Thanks a lot for your unwavering support and for being an incredible source of inspiration throughout our professional journey together.”

Venkatesh CM “Rajeev is a great Engineering Manager who aces both soft skill of managing people as-well-as understanding technology. He is able to comprehend technology issues and plan out strategy to solve it. Rajeev is also opinionated and gives his unique point of view on many of the process or technical challenges. Rajeev has contributed heavily on several engineering process and architectural solutions in Goto Financials”

detailed_profile.about: Passionate FinTech Professional | Managing Cred Flash (BNPL) | Expertise in Collections & Customer Experience With a strong background in financial services, digital lending, and customer experience, I am currently managing Cred Flash - Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL), driving its end-to-end operations and growth. Over the years, I have gained hands-on expertise in collections, recoveries, team leadership, process optimization, and customer satisfaction across various financial portfolios, including consumer durable loans, auto loans, and digital lending products. My core skills include: ✔ Strategic Planning & Process Improvement ✔ Customer Engagement & Retention ✔ Risk Management & Revenue Maximization ✔ Team Leadership & Performance Enhancement ✔ Data Analysis & Reporting Always eager to take on new challenges, streamline operations, and enhance financial products to drive maximum impact. 🚀

experience.title: Team Leader
experience.description:
- **Collections & Recoveries Management**  

  - Managed collections for X-BKT to Write-Off BKT across multiple portfolios in Delhi NCR & UP.  

  - Implemented timely and effective recovery strategies to maximize collections.  


- **Team Handling & Performance Management**  

  - Led in-house tele-callers and direct collection executives to drive performance.  

  - Ensured productivity across multiple portfolios through strategic team management.  


- **Allocation & Segmentation Strategy**  

  - Segmented accounts based on high & low risk for better coverage.  

  - Optimized recovery performance through targeted allocation.  


- **Legal Coordination & Execution**  

  - Initiated, monitored, and executed legal matters related to collections.  

  - Ensured compliance with legal frameworks to support recovery efforts.  


- **MIS & Feedback Mechanism**  

  - Collected and analyzed daily feedback from field executives.  

  - Prepared comprehensive MIS reports for smooth follow-up on collections.  


- **Process Compliance & Adherence**  

  - Ensured strict adherence to collection processes with zero deviations.  

  - Maintained operational discipline across portfolios under supervision.  


- **Target Achievement**  

  - Consistently met and exceeded monthly collection and recovery targets.  

  - Implemented strategies to enhance efficiency and maximize revenue.

positions.subtitle: Solutions Infini
positions.description: - Provide solutions engineering support by identifying and resolving complex technical issues. - Act as the Technical Account Manager and primary point of contact for all ongoing integrations with premium clients. - Conduct detailed product demonstrations to clients, driving cross-sell and upsell opportunities. - Collaborate closely with the Sales team to support future projections and upcoming client projects. - Lead Customer Success Management efforts with a proactive approach, especially for key clients. - Manage end-to-end technical integration projects, ensuring timely delivery and alignment across teams. - Take ownership of both existing and new client projects, ensuring successful implementation and client satisfaction. - Serve as a liaison between internal teams (Tech, Product, Sales) and external stakeholders to ensure clear communication and alignment. - Ensure project timelines are met and that all stakeholders are consistently updated and aligned. - Maintain and regularly update a project tracker for visibility across teams. - Create and manage a knowledge base for both internal and client-facing teams to improve efficiency and reduce dependencies.

positions.subtitle: Solutions Infini Technologies India Pvt Ltd
positions.description: - Proficient in Microsoft Excel, Word, and PowerPoint for data handling, reporting, and presentations. - Prepare and deliver professional presentations for internal stakeholders and client-facing meetings. - Conduct agent performance audits and reviews to support continuous team improvement. - Support team management efforts by mentoring peers and coordinating day-to-day client service operations. - Deliver product training to team members and clients, ensuring a strong understanding of features and workflows. - Utilize flow builder tools to map customer use cases and analyze data to identify opportunities for process improvement. - Experience with API testing and collection using Postman for client integration and troubleshooting. - Create and maintain run-books for operations, outlining potential solutions and improvement strategies for recurring issues. - Lead and contribute to special projects, both internal initiatives and external client implementations. - Collaborate with third-party service providers to enhance client service offerings and streamline operations. - Assist in volume and sales forecasting to support strategic planning and resource allocation. - Manage client escalations effectively by ensuring timely communication, resolution, and follow-up.

My key skills include: Sales Management | Business Development | Credit Risk | Business Acquisition | Customer Retention | Analytics - Research & Trend Analysis | Relationship Management | Customer Service | Process Improvement | Training & Mentoring. detailed_profile.about: Passionate FinTech Professional | Managing Cred Flash (BNPL) | Expertise in Collections & Customer Experience With a strong background in financial services, digital lending, and customer experience, I am currently managing Cred Flash - Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL), driving its end-to-end operations and growth. Over the years, I have gained hands-on expertise in collections, recoveries, team leadership, process optimization, and customer satisfaction across various financial portfolios, including consumer durable loans, auto loans, and digital lending products. My core skills include: ✔ Strategic Planning & Process Improvement ✔ Customer Engagement & Retention ✔ Risk Management & Revenue Maximization ✔ Team Leadership & Performance Enhancement ✔ Data Analysis & Reporting Always eager to take on new challenges, streamline operations, and enhance financial products to drive maximum impact. 🚀

recommendations: Omesh Patil “I had the pleasure of working with Nitish during his tenure as an SRE for our data engineering team at CRED. We collaborated on several critical projects, including the Databricks migration and cost-efficiency initiatives. Nitish’s exemplary ownership and strong bias for action consistently set him apart. From the very beginning, he proactively identified areas for improvement and implemented solutions that greatly enhanced the reliability and performance of our data infrastructure. He frequently stepped up for high-impact initiatives and delivered results under tight timelines without ever compromising on quality. What truly stands out about Nitish is his deep technical expertise. He is well-versed in modern SRE practices, cloud platforms, and data engineering principles. More importantly, he has a relentless drive to uncover root causes and get to the truth of complex issues—a quality that proved invaluable in troubleshooting incidents and optimizing our systems. In summary, Nitish would be an outstanding addition to any team seeking a skilled, dependable SRE who leads by example and never shies away from a challenge. I highly recommend him.”

detailed_profile.about: Passionate FinTech Professional | Managing Cred Flash (BNPL) | Expertise in Collections & Customer Experience With a strong background in financial services, digital lending, and customer experience, I am currently managing Cred Flash - Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL), driving its end-to-end operations and growth. Over the years, I have gained hands-on expertise in collections, recoveries, team leadership, process optimization, and customer satisfaction across various financial portfolios, including consumer durable loans, auto loans, and digital lending products. My core skills include: ✔ Strategic Planning & Process Improvement ✔ Customer Engagement & Retention ✔ Risk Management & Revenue Maximization ✔ Team Leadership & Performance Enhancement ✔ Data Analysis & Reporting Always eager to take on new challenges, streamline operations, and enhance financial products to drive maximum impact. 🚀

  - Implemented strategies to enhance efficiency and maximize revenue.

positions.subtitle: CRED
positions.description: - Spearheading the adoption of a shift-left security approach, embedding robust measures such as SBOM generation & versioning, SCA, SAST, secret scanning, logging & monitoring, and SCM security into the SDLC. - Designed an open-source framework "SupplyShield" capable of supporting security scans for 1,000+ daily deployments, enabling automated and consistent security assessments. - Developed an in-house Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) dashboard to track overall and pod-wise security posture.
positions.title: Senior Security Engineer
positions.description_html:
- Spearheading the adoption of a shift-left security approach, embedding robust measures such as SBOM generation & versioning, SCA, SAST, secret scanning, logging & monitoring, and SCM security into the SDLC.

- Designed an open-source framework "SupplyShield" capable of supporting security scans for 1,000+ daily deployments, enabling automated and consistent security assessments.

- Developed an in-house Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) dashboard to track overall and pod-wise security posture.

positions.subtitle: CRED
positions.description: - Developed guidelines and automated processes for the Responsible Disclosure Program, ensuring timely and efficient handling of vulnerabilities with SLA-driven responses. This reduced response times by 55%. - Developed AI powered security tools "ShieldX" and "RapidRDP" to enhance security team and developer productivity. - Conducted annual Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions and hands-on security training sessions for 100+ engineers and elevated security knowledge across teams. - Managed end-to-end security for the GTMs of 3+ products, ensuring they met security standards from inception to deployment.

detailed_profile.about: Passionate FinTech Professional | Managing Cred Flash (BNPL) | Expertise in Collections & Customer Experience With a strong background in financial services, digital lending, and customer experience, I am currently managing Cred Flash - Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL), driving its end-to-end operations and growth. Over the years, I have gained hands-on expertise in collections, recoveries, team leadership, process optimization, and customer satisfaction across various financial portfolios, including consumer durable loans, auto loans, and digital lending products. My core skills include: ✔ Strategic Planning & Process Improvement ✔ Customer Engagement & Retention ✔ Risk Management & Revenue Maximization ✔ Team Leadership & Performance Enhancement ✔ Data Analysis & Reporting Always eager to take on new challenges, streamline operations, and enhance financial products to drive maximum impact. 🚀

experience.title: Team Leader
experience.description:
- **Collections & Recoveries Management**  

  - Managed collections for X-BKT to Write-Off BKT across multiple portfolios in Delhi NCR & UP.  

  - Implemented timely and effective recovery strategies to maximize collections.  


- **Team Handling & Performance Management**  

  - Led in-house tele-callers and direct collection executives to drive performance.  

  - Ensured productivity across multiple portfolios through strategic team management.  


- **Allocation & Segmentation Strategy**  

  - Segmented accounts based on high & low risk for better coverage.  

  - Optimized recovery performance through targeted allocation.  


- **Legal Coordination & Execution**  

  - Initiated, monitored, and executed legal matters related to collections.  

  - Ensured compliance with legal frameworks to support recovery efforts.  


- **MIS & Feedback Mechanism**  

  - Collected and analyzed daily feedback from field executives.  

  - Prepared comprehensive MIS reports for smooth follow-up on collections.  


- **Process Compliance & Adherence**  

  - Ensured strict adherence to collection processes with zero deviations.  

  - Maintained operational discipline across portfolios under supervision.  


- **Target Achievement**  

  - Consistently met and exceeded monthly collection and recovery targets.  

  - Implemented strategies to enhance efficiency and maximize revenue.

matched.match_rationale: Both Kapil Yadav and Priyanshee Singh are involved in data analysis and visualization, with skills in Power BI and business analytics.

detailed_profile.name: Priyanshee Singh
detailed_profile.position: Data Analyst | Analytics @ CRED| SQL,Python,PowerBI ,Stats |Converting Raw Data into Strategic Actions
detailed_profile.about: Serving Notice period - Immediate Joiner ✅Experience – Worked extensively in data management for a food delivery platform as an intern and currently at a fintech startup with SQL, Python libraries, Statistics, Microsoft Excel and Power BI, operational efficiency, and user engagement strategies. ✅ Automation & Workflow Optimization – Developed automated data pipelines to streamline reporting and decision-making processes. ✅ Data Visualization & Reporting – Built dynamic dashboards and reports to translate complex data into clear business insights. ✅ Data-Driven Storytelling – Built interactive dashboards and reports to provide actionable insights that drive strategic decisions. ✅ Personal Projects & Continuous Learning – Currently working on a loan prediction project, focusing on automation and visualization to enhance financial data analysis. ✅ Cross-Functional Collaboration – Partnered with business, product, and engineering teams to translate data into meaningful solutions. 🔍 What Drives Me? Passionate about leveraging data to solve real-world problems, uncover insights, and drive business growth. Always eager to explore new technologies, optimize analytical workflows, and contribute to impactful projects in data analytics and business intelligence. 📩 Let’s Connect! Open to networking, collaborations, and discussing exciting projects. Let’s chat! Notice period - 1 month

education.title: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

recommendations: Omesh Patil “I had the pleasure of working with Nitish during his tenure as an SRE for our data engineering team at CRED. We collaborated on several critical projects, including the Databricks migration and cost-efficiency initiatives. Nitish’s exemplary ownership and strong bias for action consistently set him apart. From the very beginning, he proactively identified areas for improvement and implemented solutions that greatly enhanced the reliability and performance of our data infrastructure. He frequently stepped up for high-impact initiatives and delivered results under tight timelines without ever compromising on quality. What truly stands out about Nitish is his deep technical expertise. He is well-versed in modern SRE practices, cloud platforms, and data engineering principles. More importantly, he has a relentless drive to uncover root causes and get to the truth of complex issues—a quality that proved invaluable in troubleshooting incidents and optimizing our systems. In summary, Nitish would be an outstanding addition to any team seeking a skilled, dependable SRE who leads by example and never shies away from a challenge. I highly recommend him.”

publications.title: Predictive Analysis from Patient Health Records Using Machine Learning
publications.subtitle: IEEE
publications.description: In the healthcare sector, predictive analysis deals with identifying potential health risks and diagnosing patients with the help of patient data-driven models. This development has many potential applications, including reducing the workload on healthcare workers by accelerating the diagnostic process and predicting the likelihood of patients developing specific diseases. Predictive analysis can be extremely useful in Cardiology, as early risk detection would greatly help healthcare professionals to ensure timely treatment and care. In our study, we utilized machine learning techniques and approaches to analyze patient health data and predict the likelihood of Cardiovascular Diseases. A machine learning algorithm was developed that produced positive results using feature selection and ensemble techniques, and an accuracy rate of 90.24 percent was achieved. These results show us the potential of predictive analysis in cardiology and the importance of using patient data to develop more efficient treatment methods.

projects.title: Predictive Analysis for ROP using patient health records (Machine Learning)
projects.description: The objective is to build a predictive machine-learning model which uses patient health records and retinal images to detect severe retinopathy of prematurity among prematurely born infants. This project uses data directly obtained from an eye hospital in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India.

projects.description: This project uses various ML algorithms to help predict the presence and risk of cardiovascular disease in a patient using their health records.

detailed_profile.name: Michael Haas
detailed_profile.position: Founder & CEO at CRED iQ ● CRE & CMBS market data provider ●
detailed_profile.about: Founder & CEO of CRED iQ: About CRED iQ: CRED iQ is a market data provider that offers a robust suite of data and software solutions tailored for commercial real estate and finance professionals. With over $2.3 trillion of CRE loans, CRED iQ delivers instant access to a comprehensive range of financial data and analytics for millions of properties in every market. CRED iQ’s data and analytical capabilities are instrumental in helping investors, lenders and brokers make informed and strategic decisions critical to their business. About Michael Haas: Michael Haas is the Founder and CEO of CRED iQ, a leading provider of market data and actionable intelligence for the commercial real estate (CRE), commercial mortgage-backed securities (CMBS), and finance industries. Through advanced data feeds and powerful analytical tools, CRED iQ equips professionals with the insights necessary to make informed decisions. With over 18 years of experience in CRE finance, Michael specializes in valuation, structured finance, and the development of technology platforms. Before founding CRED iQ, he held senior leadership roles at KBRA, where he identified a critical need for innovative technology to centralize and integrate data across the CRE and finance sectors—an insight that ultimately led to the creation of CRED iQ. Michael’s career began as a valuation expert at KPMG, and he holds a degree from Villanova University. His work has been featured in prominent outlets such as The Wall Street Journal, Bloomberg, CREFC, and Reuters. Today, both Michael and CRED iQ continue to provide essential data and insights that shape the industry. Specialties: • Leading technology teams and developing new products • Distressed debt / non-performing loan valuation • Strategizing, developing and maintaining CMBS valuation and surveillance platforms • Deal & loan structuring • Structured finance analysis (CMBS / CRE CLO / SBLL / Freddie Mac / Fannie Mae) • Debt and equity capitalization (senior debt, mezzanine, & private equity)

positions.subtitle: Cognizant
positions.description: Designed integrated mobile app providing content & banking experience to SME customers of a leading Singapore Bank  Worked with UX designers & product analysts to optimize user journeys, design wire frames and screen mock ups representing customer speak – for simplified banking experience and improved content discovery and consumption  Conducted user research to validate app usability, refine & prioritize major features on product backlog and identify user’s content preferences  Responsible for sprint planning and agile delivery: Authored user stories, Managed product backlog, Worked with development and testing teams for delivering shippable code effectively ----------- Designed end state prototype for a secured collaboration app (Chat, Calls & Conference) to engage wealth customers of a Thailand bank  Defined user personas, end to end user journey, and use cases for remote sales & servicing  Conducted market scan and competition analysis to benchmark MVP offering and identify best in class UX trends  Worked with UX team to design screens and clickable prototype  Liaised with RMs, Product, business, technology and compliance to validate potential fit for the product, identify MVP features and improve experience modes ---------------- Ideation & roll-out of analytics platform for of leading wealth management bank  Successfully pitched business case to APAC COO & cross functional leaders securing their buy-in, funding and support  Worked with multiple engineering teams to integrate Tableau & AXIOM with core banking platform, made design trade-offs to limit integration cost to available budget & time without compromising features for end users  Worked with data analysts to design Visual (Tableau) Dashboards for prioritized use cases  Conducted demo & trainings for internal users, optimized use cases based on user feedback and usage data analysis

positions.description: Designed integrated mobile app providing content & banking experience to SME customers of a leading Singapore Bank  Worked with UX designers & product analysts to optimize user journeys, design wire frames and screen mock ups representing customer speak – for simplified banking experience and improved content discovery and consumption  Conducted user research to validate app usability, refine & prioritize major features on product backlog and identify user’s content preferences  Responsible for sprint planning and agile delivery: Authored user stories, Managed product backlog, Worked with development and testing teams for delivering shippable code effectively ----------- Designed end state prototype for a secured collaboration app (Chat, Calls & Conference) to engage wealth customers of a Thailand bank  Defined user personas, end to end user journey, and use cases for remote sales & servicing  Conducted market scan and competition analysis to benchmark MVP offering and identify best in class UX trends  Worked with UX team to design screens and clickable prototype  Liaised with RMs, Product, business, technology and compliance to validate potential fit for the product, identify MVP features and improve experience modes ---------------- Ideation & roll-out of analytics platform for of leading wealth management bank  Successfully pitched business case to APAC COO & cross functional leaders securing their buy-in, funding and support  Worked with multiple engineering teams to integrate Tableau & AXIOM with core banking platform, made design trade-offs to limit integration cost to available budget & time without compromising features for end users  Worked with data analysts to design Visual (Tableau) Dashboards for prioritized use cases  Conducted demo & trainings for internal users, optimized use cases based on user feedback and usage data analysis

recommendations: Anikesh Bhandarkar “Anmol has been a fantastic professional to work with and an amazing mentor. His visionary targets, thought clarity and capacity to bring structure to the most ambiguous paths enables him to successfully deliver larger agendas. His ability to plan, prioritize and focus on things which deliver maximum impact and then execute them with razor sharp clarity drives results to a 100%. I have always been amazed by his understanding of the 'why' behind larger business decisions and his ideas to scale businesses through the perfect blend of Strategy & Technology. Anmol has always been one dynamic person who has an answer to every problem you ask him. But the best thing is he never gives you the answer directly, but only steers your thinking in the right direction. Having worked with him closely for a year, you only realize that the learning journey working with Anmol is endless. Besides being the best mentor one can ever have, Anmol is soon to be one of the most groundbreaking Product leaders and successful businessmen of all times, hands down! My best wishes to him in his success trajectory.”

recommendations: Shubham Utwal “A Remarkable Senior Colleague and Mentor! I have admired Rajeev from the moment I joined Gojek, and having had the pleasure of working closely on various initiatives within Gojek, in retrospect, the interactions have left a lasting mark on my career and personal growth. Throughout my time working with Rajeev, I have had the opportunity to collaborate on recruitment drives, attend enlightening distributed systems sessions, engage in thought-provoking discussions about uptime and production issues, and participate in various organization-wide initiatives, including incident management. Rajeev’s contributions and expertise in these areas have been invaluable to my professional development. What sets Rajeev apart is not only his technical knowledge and skills but also his unwavering dedication to mentoring and guiding others. Whenever I sought assistance, Rajeev was always willing to lend a helping hand and share his insights. His guidance has played a significant role in shaping my understanding of character-building, execution, and the importance of embracing new challenges, eg. leading the "hangout with the makers" podcast series. One of the most impressive aspects of working with Rajeev is his ability to teach passively. Observing how he approached tasks and tackled obstacles, I learned the importance of perseverance, resilience, and maintaining a positive mindset, regardless of the outcome. Rajeev’s unwavering commitment to giving his best in every situation has served as an inspiration to me and has motivated me to strive for excellence in my own work. Beyond his technical expertise, Rajeev embodies the qualities of a true leader. He consistently demonstrates a strong work ethic, exceptional communication skills, and a genuine interest in fostering a collaborative and supportive work environment. His inclusive approach and willingness to engage in meaningful discussions have fostered a sense of camaraderie among the team and have created an atmosphere of continuous learning. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Rajeev as an outstanding professional and mentor. His contributions to our organization, coupled with his willingness to support and guide others, make him a highly valuable asset. I am grateful for the knowledge and insights I have gained from Rajeev and I am confident that anyone fortunate enough to work with him will benefit greatly from his expertise, mentorship, and exceptional leadership abilities. Thanks a lot for your unwavering support and for being an incredible source of inspiration throughout our professional journey together.”

Venkatesh CM “Rajeev is a great Engineering Manager who aces both soft skill of managing people as-well-as understanding technology. He is able to comprehend technology issues and plan out strategy to solve it. Rajeev is also opinionated and gives his unique point of view on many of the process or technical challenges. Rajeev has contributed heavily on several engineering process and architectural solutions in Goto Financials”

detailed_profile.about: Passionate FinTech Professional | Managing Cred Flash (BNPL) | Expertise in Collections & Customer Experience With a strong background in financial services, digital lending, and customer experience, I am currently managing Cred Flash - Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL), driving its end-to-end operations and growth. Over the years, I have gained hands-on expertise in collections, recoveries, team leadership, process optimization, and customer satisfaction across various financial portfolios, including consumer durable loans, auto loans, and digital lending products. My core skills include: ✔ Strategic Planning & Process Improvement ✔ Customer Engagement & Retention ✔ Risk Management & Revenue Maximization ✔ Team Leadership & Performance Enhancement ✔ Data Analysis & Reporting Always eager to take on new challenges, streamline operations, and enhance financial products to drive maximum impact. 🚀

recommendations: Jarred Young “Jake is the rare combination of sharp sales intelligence and relentless execution that every revenue leader dreams of finding. During our time working directly together, Jake consistently demonstrated what enterprise-grade selling truly looks like: methodical, surgical in his execution, and always putting the customer's success at the center of every conversation. What sets Jake apart is his incredible coachability paired with natural sales acumen. He doesn't just absorb feedback; he weaponizes it, immediately applying coaching to drive measurable improvement. Jake's organizational skills became the backbone of our most sophisticated sales processes. He didn't just follow our enterprise playbook - he helped refine it. His consultative approach and integrity separate him from the pack, he'll dive deep into a prospect's business architecture and only move forward when he's confident our solution will genuinely impact their success. Jake is built to break through ceilings. Someone who'll continue to find ways to raise the bar while bringing up the entire team around him. Any organization would be fortunate to have someone with his combination of intelligence, work ethic, and character driving their revenue growth.”

Nina Mancuso “Jake is an incredible Account Executive. He understands his products and goes the extra mile to ensure that he provides the most accurate information available. He knows how to connect with people, which is a key trait to have in his role. He also understands the importance of documentation and how good technical documentation can enhance the sales and onboarding experience. Jake fully grasps how and when to make moves happen. He is so incredibly kind and always willing to help, even when he is busy. I absolutely enjoyed working with Jake at Simplr!”

positions.subtitle: Cognizant
positions.description: Designed integrated mobile app providing content & banking experience to SME customers of a leading Singapore Bank  Worked with UX designers & product analysts to optimize user journeys, design wire frames and screen mock ups representing customer speak – for simplified banking experience and improved content discovery and consumption  Conducted user research to validate app usability, refine & prioritize major features on product backlog and identify user’s content preferences  Responsible for sprint planning and agile delivery: Authored user stories, Managed product backlog, Worked with development and testing teams for delivering shippable code effectively ----------- Designed end state prototype for a secured collaboration app (Chat, Calls & Conference) to engage wealth customers of a Thailand bank  Defined user personas, end to end user journey, and use cases for remote sales & servicing  Conducted market scan and competition analysis to benchmark MVP offering and identify best in class UX trends  Worked with UX team to design screens and clickable prototype  Liaised with RMs, Product, business, technology and compliance to validate potential fit for the product, identify MVP features and improve experience modes ---------------- Ideation & roll-out of analytics platform for of leading wealth management bank  Successfully pitched business case to APAC COO & cross functional leaders securing their buy-in, funding and support  Worked with multiple engineering teams to integrate Tableau & AXIOM with core banking platform, made design trade-offs to limit integration cost to available budget & time without compromising features for end users  Worked with data analysts to design Visual (Tableau) Dashboards for prioritized use cases  Conducted demo & trainings for internal users, optimized use cases based on user feedback and usage data analysis

projects.description: A parser for self-defined language was designed which identifies multiple syntax errors.A target code generator was designed which produces MIPS assembly code as output. The generated code was executable on the MIPS simulation platform SPIM.

projects.title: Smart Refrigerator
projects.description: A smart refrigerator was designed in a group of four. An android app was interfaced with this prototype using Blue-tooth module to get the status of the temperature inside the refrigerator and also about the objects present inside the fridge. An auto temperature calibrator was also implemented.The prototyping platform used was Arduino.

projects.title: Assembler-Linker-Loader for a custom assembly language
projects.description: Designed an assembler-linker-loader for a custom assembly language whose instruction set could be defined in a separate file. This made the code modular and portable to different devices using different instruction sets. A simulator was also designed for the same.

detailed_profile.name: Divya Hariharan
detailed_profile.position: Partner - Commercial and Healthcare at Cred Financial Services
detailed_profile.about: I am an energetic and vibrant Sales and Account Management Professional with a wealth of experience in Commercial and Corporate banking across Australasia with specific areas of expertise incorporating credit risk analysis, business acquisition, and customer retention. I have an innovative solutions driven approach, which is supported by my curious, results-driven nature and exemplary focus on customer service. I value honesty and integrity, building trust and respect with Stakeholders through excellent communication both verbal and written. My exceptional sales focus on both new and existing business is evidenced by a systematic approach that has increased revenue growth. Credentials include Bachelor of Commerce (Accounting & International Business) and a Diploma in Financial Services RG146. My key skills include: Sales Management | Business Development | Credit Risk | Business Acquisition | Customer Retention | Analytics - Research & Trend Analysis | Relationship Management | Customer Service | Process Improvement | Training & Mentoring. I currently hold a Tier 5 Working Holiday visa for UK expiring in February 2019
